exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice P : T s : Pred (ideal P) Unable to unify "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class ?M1464) in mx_leq) ?M1466 (sup ?M1465)" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class T) in mx_leq) (sup [Pred x | exists p : ideal P, p \\In s /\\ id_val p = x]) P".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
P: Lattice.sort T
s: Pred (ideal P)

Goal:
ideal_sup' s <== P

Premises:
Notation Lattice T m := (Lattice.pack id)
ideal_sup' = fun s : Pred (ideal P) => sup [Pred x | exists p : ideal P, p \In s /\ id_val p = x] : Pred (ideal P) -> T
ideal : forall T : poset, T -> Type
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
Lattice.sort = fun t : lattice => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : lattice -> Type Lattice.sort is a coercion
subLattice : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> lattice
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
idealPosetMixin : forall (T : poset) (P : T), Poset.mixin_of (ideal P)
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p
pair_supP : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), p \In s -> p <== pair_sup s
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
fun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), p \In s -> p <== fun_sup s
infP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), x \In s -> inf s <== x
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
dfun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall q : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), q \In s -> q <== p) -> dfun_sup s <== p
dfun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), p \In s -> p <== dfun_sup s
sup_clos_idemp : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> sup_closure s =p s
pairLattice = fun A B : lattice => Lattice.Pack {| Lattice.base := {| Poset.mixin := pairPosetMixin A B |}; Lattice.mixin := pairLatticeMixin A B |} (A * B) : lattice -> lattice -> lattice
sub_sup : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> Pred (subPoset s) -> subPoset s
sup_clos_sub : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), s <=p sup_closure s
sub_supX : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> forall u : Pred (subPoset s), sub_sup' u \In s
Lattice.poset = fun cT : lattice => Poset.Pack (Lattice.class cT) cT : lattice -> poset Lattice.poset is a coercion
sup_clos_min : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (t : Pred_Class), s <=p t -> sup_closed t -> sup_closure s <=p t
Lattice.sup = fun cT : lattice => [eta Lattice.mx_sup (Lattice.mixin (Lattice.class cT))] : forall cT : lattice, Pred cT -> cT Arguments Lattice.sup {cT}
dfunLattice : forall A : Type, (A -> lattice) -> lattice
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
Lattice.Pack : forall sort : Type, Lattice.class_of sort -> Type -> lattice
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
subLatticeMixin : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T), sup_closed s -> Lattice.mixin_of (subPoset s)

```coq
unfold ideal_sup'.
intros.
apply supP.
auto.
Qed.```
